About Mayor McCarty
-------------------

### City Council

* Elected Mayor (May 2024)

### Current NRH Committees

* Crime Control and Prevention District, Chair
* Landscape Review Board, Chair
* Sign Review Board, Chair
* Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 3 (TIF 3)
* Capital Improvement Projects (CIP) Committee, Alternate
* Park & Recreation Facilities Development Corporation
* Charter Review Commission

### Prior NRH Board and Commission Service

* Parks and Recreation Board

### Birdville ISD Service

* Served 2 terms as President of the Board of Trustees.
* Elected Board of Trustees, 2011, 2012, 2015, and 2018
* Led the Board to purchase property for the current location of the Birdville Agriculture Science Center.
* As President, fought and won the right to open school board meetings with a prayer, *American Humanist Association vs. McCarty* (U.S. Court of Appeals, 5th Circuit)

### Community Service

* Deacon at Cross Church NRH
* Sunday School Teacher (over 30 years) for Cross Church NRH
* Regular Volunteer for the Fort Worth Stock Show and Rodeo
* Launched Ag Backers, a non-profit fundraising organization that supports local BISD FFA students who participate at the Tarrant County Junior Livestock Show.
* Served as a Board Member for both the Richland Hills Riding Club and Keller Saddle Club
* Trinity Metro, Board of Directors

### Personal

* Born in North Richland Hills
* Certified Public Accountant
* Member of The Texas Society of Certified Public Accountants (TSCPA)
* Masters in Business Administration, Southern Methodist University
* Bachelor of Business Administration in Accounting, Texas Christian University
* Richland High School Graduate, Class of 1980
* Retired, Chief Operating Officer for a $1.1 billion company
* He and his wife Dana have 2 daughters, 2 sons-in-laws, 3 grandchildren, and many dogs, horses, cats, and goats.

### Honors

* 2016 Richland High School Distinguished alumni
* FFA Lifetime Supporter Award for the Birdville Center of Technology and Advanced Learning
